instructions: On your iPhone, open a web browser and go to https://reportaproblem.apple.com . Log into that site using the Apple ID used to purchase the items you're having a problem with. When you log in, you'll see a list of your purchases. Either search for the item at the top or scroll through the site. When you find the item you're having a problem with, tap Report . Tap the drop-down menu and select a category of problem. When that's done, add any additional detail you want in the text box. Tap Submit and your help request will be sent to Apple.
